values: A heap of things is a large pile of them.
After the building was torn down, all that was left was a heap of bricks.
n. 堆；许多；累积 vt. 堆；堆积 vi. 堆起来

- n. 累积；堆；许多
- vt. 堆积；堆
- vi. 堆起来

HEAPabbr. High-Explosive Armour-Piercing 高爆穿甲(弹)

时 态:  
heaped, heaping, heaps
n.堆，堆积,<口>许多，大量,<俚>破车vt.扔成一堆,完全填满，灌满,大量或奢侈的赠予
